review: Best thing out there,  the possibilities of doing stuff is great.  This is my 5th one  that I have purchased.  The price is great,  you can mirror your laptop screen using Google Chrome by getting the extension Google cast.  Cast your pictures and videos from your cell phone using airwire app,  cast any video or movie  online from your phone using Web video caster on android phones.  You can play games like just Dance and use your phone as the control.  Great product which keeps improving.  I definitely recommend this product.
author: Alberto Gonzalez
